snippet: Mitt Romney's lead over his nearest competitor, Ron Paul, is 22.6 percentage points, based on polling through Saturday morning.
abstract: Mitt Romney's lead over his nearest competitor, Ron Paul, is 22.6 percentage points, based on polling through Saturday morning.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -- At a rally for Mitt Romney in Derry on Saturday morning, Gov. Nikki R. Haley of South Carolina set a high bar for Mr. Romney's performance in the New Hampshire primary on Tuesday.

headline.main: Beating Romney in N.H. Would Require Historic Upset
